original_text: Then Lazarus died and God's angels carried him away. They put him at the side of Abraham in heaven. The rich man then also died and his family buried him in the ground.
korean_text: 이에 그 거지가 죽어 천사들에게 받들려 아브라함의 품에 들어가고 부자도 죽어 장사되매

sentences.original_text: and God's angels carried him away
They put him at the side of Abraham in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 하늘에 있는 아브라함의 곁에 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: The rich man then also died
and his family buried him in the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 가족이 그를 땅에 묻었습니다
